org.jasig.cas.services.web

Class RegisteredServiceSimpleFormController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.services.web.AbstractManagementController
      • org.jasig.cas.services.web.RegisteredServiceSimpleFormController

  • @Controller(value="registeredServiceSimpleFormController")
public final class RegisteredServiceSimpleFormController
extends AbstractManagementController
    Handle adding/editing of RegisteredServices.

    3.1
